"Nautilus Technology is an Australian startup technology company with the vision of" "creating and accelerating competitive advantages through cutting-edge technology and" "solutions.

MyMetro was initially launched to provide support to the transit riders of" "Australian Cities. Over the time it has extended it's service to other parts of the world." "MyMetro is a free to use real-time transit platform. The real-time" "transit data is provided by corresponding State/Government Transport Agencies.

Visit" "https://nautilus-tech.com.au and https://mymetro.au to find out more.

MyMetro" "is using the OneBusAway transit platform. OneBusAway is a project of the non-profit" "Open Transit Software Foundation (OTSF). It began in 2008 as a graduate student project" "by Brian Ferris and Kari Watkins at the University of Washington and evolved to become" "the topic of both of their PhD dissertations. Find out more about the OneBusAway" "open-source project at https://onebusaway.org.

The project is licensed under" "Apache v2.0 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)."
